On your way down, be sure to scope out the deals we are tracking on M4 MacBook Air – all configs are now $250 off at Amazon – as well as M5 MacBook Pro at $250 off and this giant $699 price drop on M4 iPad Pro configs at Costco.

items.title: Explosive device kills 3 children in northern Rwanda
items.summary: KIGALI, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- At least three children were killed by an explosive device in a village in northern Rwanda, a local official and police said Wednesday. Read full story

items.title: Mercedes-Benz discontinues feature that syncs music to driving
items.summary: Mercedes-Benz sent out a notice to customers recently announcing its plans to discontinue MBUX Sound Drive, an interactive audio feature that syncs music to the car's actions. The feature was first announced less than a year ago at CES in partnership with Black Eyed Peas frontman Will.i.am. Notices went out recently to customers that MBUX […]

items.title: This iPhone case with a second screen lets you snap selfies with its rear cameras
items.summary: Smartphones with secondary screens on the back aren't a new idea. Most recently the Xiaomi 17 series launched in September with a smaller rear display and while the company suggests using it for widgets or gaming, the most practical use is as a way to frame selfies captured with the phone's superior rear cameras. The […]

items.title: Warner Bros. Discovery wants its shareholders to reject Paramount’s latest offer
items.summary: Though Paramount Skydance was trying to buy Warner Bros. Discovery for much more money than Netflix is offering, David Zaslav and the rest of WBD's board are urging their shareholders to give Oracle scion David Ellison the cold shoulder. Today, WBD's board announced that it has unanimously decided that its shareholders would be much better […]

items.title: Starmer tells Abramovich to 'pay up now' or face court
items.summary: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians

items.title: Jimmy Wales trusts the process
items.summary: Wikipedia will be 25 years old in January. During that time, the encyclopedia has gone from a punchline about the unreliability of online information to the factual foundation of the web. The project's status as a trusted source of facts has made it a target of authoritarian governments and powerful individuals, who are attempting to […]

items.title: Gemini 3 Flash costs $0.50 per 1M input tokens and $3 per 1M output tokens, vs. Gemini 2.5 Flash's $0.30 per 1M input tokens and $2.50 per 1M output tokens (Tulsee Doshi/The Keyword)
items.summary:
Tulsee Doshi / The Keyword:
Gemini 3 Flash costs $0.50 per 1M input tokens and $3 per 1M output tokens, vs. Gemini 2.5 Flash's $0.30 per 1M input tokens and $2.50 per 1M output tokens  —  Gemini 3 Flash is our latest model with frontier intelligence built for speed that helps everyone learn, build, and plan anything — faster.

items.title: Anker’s 25,000mAh display-equipped power bank with retractable cable is back to Black Friday price at $88
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas sale, Anker’s official storefront is offering its 25,000mAh Laptop power bank in black for $87.99 shipped. This is regularly a $120 unit, which is now seeing a $32 discount. Today’s deal marks the return of the Black Friday price we tracked for this battery pack last month, making this a great time to cash in and snag one for yourself or as a last-minute gift – you can get it before Christmas. Only once before today have we seen this unit go for anything less than today’s discounted price when it briefly dropped at Newegg, and it’s now within $6 of that. You can also get this in silver, although it’s currently fetching its full $120 price. Head below for more details along with deals on other Anker charging gear.

more…

items.title: Brazil threatens to abandon Mercosur-EU deal as Italy, France seek delay
items.summary: SAO PAULO, Dec 17 (Reuters) - Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Wednesday that if the trade agreement between the European Union and the South American trade bloc Mercosur is not finalized this month, Brazil will no longer sign off on the deal. Read full story

items.title: Macy’s 24-hour LEGO flash sale offers up to 40% savings on sets for Xmas shopping needs – deals start from $24
items.summary:
For today only, Macy’s is having a 24-hour LEGO flash sale with up to 40% discounts across a large selection of building sets for all your Christmas shopping needs. You’ll find a large array of themes included here, like Star Wars, City, Technic, Minecraft, Super Mario, Botanicals, Friends, Creator, Marvel, Disney, and so many more. There’s even chances to score soon-to-retire sets like the 546-piece Fortnite Durrr Burger at $51.99 shipped, bring more decoration into your space with sets like the 822-piece Botanicals Bouquet of Roses at $47.99 shipped, or expand your armies with options like the 258-piece Star Wars 327th Star Corps Clone Troopers Battle Pack at $35.99 shipped – plus so many other options! Head below to browse the full lineup while they’re still around through midnight tonight.

more…

items.title: African Dev't Fund approves 23-mln-USD grant to boost electricity supply in Somali city
items.summary: MOGADISHU, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- The African Development Fund, the concessional financing arm of the African Development Bank Group, has approved a 23.36-million-U.S.-dollar grant to bring clean and reliable electricity to Bosaso, a key commercial hub in northern Somalia. Read full story

items.title: Chinese, Zimbabwean firms to partner on power equipment manufacturing
items.summary: HARARE, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- Zimbabwe's Cabinet has approved a joint venture partnership with a Chinese company for the manufacture of power equipment, Minister of Information, Publicity, and Broadcasting Services Jenfan Muswere has said. Read full story

items.title: China's Xinjiang invests heavily in water conservancy project construction
items.summary: URUMQI, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- Northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region has accelerated construction of water conservancy projects since the beginning of this year, achieving a cumulative investment exceeding 40 billion yuan (about 5.67 billion U.S. dollars). Read full story

items.title: Uganda projects 10.4 pct economic growth in 2026/27 financial year
items.summary: KAMPALA, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- Uganda's economy is forecast to expand by 10.4 percent by the end of the 2026/2027 financial year, up from an estimated 6.6 percent at the end of the 2025/2026 financial year. Read full story

items.title: Major south China airport reports record annual passenger throughput
items.summary: GUANGZHOU, Dec. 17 (Xinhua) -- Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport in south China's Guangdong Province on Wednesday announced that its annual passenger throughput has surpassed 80 million for the first time, with that figure including over 16.6 million international travelers. Read full story

items.title: Google makes Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and Search's AI mode; it scored 33.7% without tool use on Humanity's Last Exam vs. 3 Pro's 37.5% (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Google makes Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and Search's AI mode; it scored 33.7% without tool use on Humanity's Last Exam vs. 3 Pro's 37.5%  —  Google today released its fast and cheap Gemini 3 Flash model, based on the Gemini 3 released last month, looking to steal OpenAI's thunder.

items.title: Hainan FTP launches special customs clearance
items.summary: HAIKOU, Dec. 18 (Xinhua) -- Goods entering and leaving the "first line" and "second line" of the customs system of Hainan Free Trade Port (FTP) can undergo special customs clearance starting Thursday. Read full story

items.title: AI’s water and electricity use soars in 2025
items.summary: AI created as much carbon pollution this year as New York City and guzzled up as much H20 as people consume globally in water bottles, according to new estimates. The study paints what's likely a pretty conservative picture of AI's environmental impact since it's based on the relatively limited amount of data that's currently available […]

items.title: Putin says Russia will take more land in Ukraine if Europe sinks peace moves
items.summary: MOSCOW, Dec 17 (Reuters) - President Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday Russia would take more land in Ukraine by force if Kyiv and European politicians whom he cast as "young pigs" did not engage over U.S. proposals for a peace settlement. Read full story

items.summary: It's only the 13th known case of adoption out of the 4,600 bears studied for nearly five decades in the northern Canadian area.

items.title: Save up to $720 on these three Lectric e-bikes with price cuts to lows starting from $1,399 for Xmas
items.summary:
Looking back in on Lectric’s ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale event, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the three e-bikes receiving rare price cuts over the usual free bundle packages – a first for so many models at once. The biggest of these price cuts that also retains a bundle is Lectric’s ONE e-bike Long-Range Belt-Drive Commuter e-bike with a $220 FREE bundle of gear at $1,899 shipped. This entire package would normally run you $2,619 at full price, with a repeat of the $500 price cut we’ve been seeing more frequently since Labor Day to its all-time lowest tracked price, along with a FREE rear cargo rack and fender set. While the deadline to receive it before Christmas has passed, you can still secure it and all the other e-bikes with some of their best deals to kick-off your new year with a new commuting option. Head below to browse the lineup of e-bike price cuts, while you can also browse the brand’s full Christmas lineup here.

items.title: Google sues the Chinese-speaking cybercriminal group known as Darcula, behind an alleged US text message phishing ring, in the US, seeking a restraining order (Kevin Collier/NBC News)
items.summary:
Kevin Collier / NBC News:
Google sues the Chinese-speaking cybercriminal group known as Darcula, behind an alleged US text message phishing ring, in the US, seeking a restraining order  —  Google says the group's tools enabled scammers with little technical skill to impersonate agencies like the IRS and the USPS at a massive scale.

items.title: For 48 hours, you can pick up Bluetti’s latest Elite 10 Mini power station at a new $109 Xmas flash sale low (Save $90), more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Sale, Bluetti has a 48-hour flash sale running that is taking up to $199 off three different offers, with a notable standout in the Elite 10 Mini Power Station for $109 shipped, which sadly cannot be stacked with the exclusive 5% off savings code, but does beat out its Amazon pricing by $10. While carrying a $239 MSRP direct from the brand, you can find it starting lower at Amazon for $199, with the holiday discounts that started last week having only taken the costs down to $149, before falling to $119 and then $109 during this flash sale window. While these $90 savings ($130 off the MSRP) last through December 18, you’re able to score it at a new all-time low price, with another flash offer being two of these stations for $199 shipped. Head below to learn more and browse the full list of temporary lows.

Buy for $18 (Reg. $30)

You’re getting a solid value here, especially since a single unit of this charger usually costs around $26 on its own. You also get two included USB-C cables, each measuring 3.3 feet. items.title: Acer’s Nitro V 16 with RTX 5050 GPU is a great starter gaming laptop and it delivers serious value today at $599
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Walmart that drops an Acer Nitro V 16-inch RTX 5050-powered gaming laptop down to $599 shipped. This AMD-powered machine typically goes for $900, so you’re looking at a straight-up $300 discount on it today. This would be a great pick for anyone upgrading from an older notebook or buying their first gaming laptop, and it delivers some serious value today at its discounted price. We recently saw the Intel-powered variant of this notebook go for less, but this one with a relatively newer, more powerful AMD Ryzen AI 5 240 AI processor has never been this low. It dropped to $629 last month ahead of the Black Friday sale, and it’s now going for $30 less. Head below for more details.

items.title: Samsung’s 2025 37-inch Odyssey G7 180Hz 4K curved gaming monitor hits new all-time low at $440 off (All-time low)
items.summary:
Samsung’s Holiday sale is still going strong with some huge markdowns on gaming monitors, Smart TVs, and more, but we just spotted an unbeatable deal at Woot that gets you one of the brand’s 2025 Odyssey G7 displays for a stellar price. As part of its wider sale on Samsung gaming monitors, Woot is offering the brand’s 2025 Odyssey G7 (G75F) 37-inch 4K curved model for $459.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is regularly a $900 display that’s currently fetching $550 directly at Samsung and Amazon. Today’s deal at Woot, however, takes $440 off its usual going rate to land it $110 below its previous all-time low and mark a new best price to beat. The 40-inch variant of this model, in case you’re wondering, is down to $650 right now, with a 50% discount on its usual going rate. Head below for more details.
